abstract: In its proxy fight with billionaire financier Carl C. Icahn, Motorola is giving as good as its getting. One day after Mr. Icahn used a full-page ad in The Wall Street Journal to compare comments by Motorola chief executive Ed Zander to “something straight out of Alice in Wonderland,” Motorola is trying a similar strategy of using its adversary’s words against him.
lead_paragraph: In its proxy fight with billionaire financier Carl C. Icahn, Motorola is giving as good as its getting. One day after Mr. Icahn used a full-page ad in The Wall Street Journal to compare comments by Motorola chief executive Ed Zander to “something straight out of Alice in Wonderland,” Motorola is trying a similar strategy of using its adversary’s words against him.

headline.main: A War of the Quotes for Motorola and Icahn
